column4: WOW. thanks for the torrent suggestion. I'm downloading ubuntu at 1meg/sec, about 15 minutes dl time
it's a torrent i fpound on the ubuntu site itself  http://torrent.ubuntu.com/simple/intrepid/alternate/
not many people use the alternate install cd... so it won't have many seeders at all... best to just grab it from a regular ftp site probably...
so that took all of what, 7 minutes?
if that, I started it, made coffee, and got to installing  :P
